name: Nia in Mushroom World
description:
Nia is finding her way back home, but some bastards won't let her go. But good thing is, she can destroy them with magic seeds, which grow into powerful mushroom.

Press arrow to move, Left Ctrl to fire, and spacebar to jump. Don't touch those bastards, you will get killed.

---

I made this for Ludum Dare 34 so if you like this, please vote for me: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=45833

Thank you so much :D
